rationale: Capo's frozen pizzas and doughs are the perfect canvas for Kalleh's premium cheeses (Mozzarella, Gouda). Both brands fall under the Solico umbrella, allowing for seamless supply chain integration.
recommended_approach: The 'Perfect Melt' Campaign: A bundled retail offer where purchasing Capo Frozen Pizza gives a discount on Kalleh Cheese dips or vice versa.
timing: Thursday nights (Weekend kickoff) and during major football tournaments.

rationale: High synergy between party-style finger foods (Capo's Hummus and Chorizo) and premium juices/mocktails for social gatherings.
recommended_approach: Co-branded 'Party Box' available on SnappFood, featuring Capo ready-to-eat snacks and Sunich sparkling drinks.
timing: Yalda Night (December) and Summer house-party season.

rationale: Capo’s premium cold cuts and deli meats require high-quality artisanal bread, which Nano Sahar provides to the same premium demographic.
recommended_approach: In-store 'Sandwich Stations' at Nano Sahar branches featuring live demos of Capo deli meat pairings.
timing: Back-to-school season (September) for premium lunchbox solutions.
